page.title: Bull Announces the Availability of NovaScale Servers Running the <b>...</b>
page.text: PARIS amp; PITTSBURGH --(Business Wire)-- Nov. 8, 2004 -- Bull today announce that its range of NovaScale servers will run the latest Intel(R) Itanium(R) 2 processors, with a L3 cache up to 9 MB, and the new
